text: The Song Poet (2016) is a memoir by Kao Kalia Yang, published by Metropolitan Press. It won the MN Book Award in creative nonfiction/memoir and was a finalist for both the National Book Critics Circle Award and the Chautauqua Prize. == References == Category:Hmong-American culture in Minnesota Category:Hmong-American culture and history Category:Asian-American art Category:Asian-American literature
title: The Song Poet
